addr: Loyola Marymount University. 1 LMU Drive . Los Angeles, Ca 90045
title: Phi Delta Theta Installation & Charter Luncheon
desc: The Gentlemen of LMU Phi Delta Theta invite you to join us for lunch on November 21 in celbration of receiving our Charter and becoming LMU's newest Fraterntiy. Ticket proceeds will go to the ALS Association, our National Philanthropy. We politely request that you come in formal attire. Lunch will be served.
